text:
BOOKING.COM - Amsterdam, The Netherlands | Tel Aviv, Israel | ONSITE | VISA support| Relocation to Amsterdam

I am a mobile developer at Booking.com, the biggest accommodations site on this planet. We are looking to hire experienced people from anywhere in the world, and to relocate them to the beautiful city of Amsterdam to work with us.

Some of the positions available are:

* Software developer (Shanghai): https://grnh.se/r47oha1

* iOS developer (Amsterdam): https://grnh.se/20dhfo1

* iOS developer (Shanghai): https://grnh.se/7bwuvbim1

* Android developer (Shanghai): https://grnh.se/ngmta71

* UX designer (Amsterdam): https://grnh.se/6lwb5c1

* UX designer (Tel Aviv): https://grnh.se/hw8l8tv31

* Product owner (Shanghai): https://grnh.se/aut3j4qf1

* Product owner DS (Amsterdam): https://grnh.se/wimip33j1

Other job vacancies at https://grnh.se/30g5b71
